pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the late effects more than 2 years after radiotherapy using a patient-reported questionnaire in patients with prostate cancer enrolled in a randomized dose-response study comparing 70 Gy (conventional) and 78 Gy (conformal) radiotherapy (RT).

metaData.source:
[Erectile dysfunction after radical prostatectomy: value of preoperative programming of intracavernous injections]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10434322/
